TopicTitle: will thee be transfer help for the new planet in mech jeb?

Articles.Content: transfer to mun and minmus so hopefully transfer to the new planets with mechjeb. is this to much to ask ( too easy ) for this upgrade? Is it maybe in the works. I love this game but more designing than steering.

Those transfers are significantly more complicated to do, so it will take a while. First the cool math has to be sorted-out (creating a function that works in certain cases is easy, but an all-encompassing function that works in all use cases is much, much harder), then the cool transfers can happen.
